Greg rose slowly from his seat with great difficulty. He was a terribly fat man. Even his large chair had a hard time letting go of his swollen hips, pinched between the arms of the chair. Furrowing her brows in concern, Danielle hesitated, but ultimately obeyed. Of course she did. She always did, even if she was having to fight down some revulsion. In his giant-sized chair, she looked hilariously tiny. When she was sat, he turned the chair so that it was facing one of his computer monitors. He leaned over and seized the mouse, then clicked about from post to post. "I wrote about it. I want you to read it."

Danielle looked up at Greg, then again returned her attention to his computer monitor. She noticed the little icon in the upper left of the page that indicated this was the forum where the redpillers, incels, MRAs, and MGTOW sorts of men gathered and discussed their ideologies and fantasies. Greg navigated to a subforum with clear NSFW warnings, and then on a top rated post by a poster named GodGreg. Clearly... that was him.

He straightened again, and kept his gaze fixed on Danielle as she began to read the thread he authored.

The girl's eyes widened. What did "GodGreg" write about?
144.title: Show Danielle one of his darker posts about her.

choices: Reminded Danielle that they had the house alone together for the weekend.
Decided to bring her to his room.
Had the bright notion to invite another family member to do things to Danielle.
Decided to bring her to the bathroom.
Simply decided to start torturing her right then and there.
15.content:
Brandon was amused. He just got home from wrestling practice within the last hour, and he couldn't help but reflect on how he had ended the day. His practice partners had been Bruno, a heavy-set teen in a completely different weight class than him, who offered a solid challenge. In the end, Brandon lost that skirmish, and Bruno had grinned back at him while pinning his head between his massive thighs and gigantic ass. As the match was called, Bruno had taunted him, and joked that he was lucky that he wasn't feeling flatulent.

For some reason, that set the gears turning in Brandon's head. He thought about how Bruno must have felt, being so much more massive, at least in terms of weight, than he was. He thought of whether or not Bruno would have felt any sort of pleasure from pinning someone evidently weaker and smaller than him, and if he would have actually gotten off on farting on him. Brandon didn't like the thought of being someone's fart cushion, but he enjoyed imagining himself in Bruno's position, with someone small and weak pinned beneath him, forced to smell his farts and eat his bare ass. Preferably a woman though--Brandon wasn't in the slightest bit gay, despite the jokes non-wrestlers often made about the nature of the sport of wrestling.

He had been on the couch when Danielle entered, just a little later than he had arrived. Her extra curricular activities were in a more academic field than Brandon's. Literature or arithmetic or something. He didn't know and never asked, because he frankly didn't really care. Whatever it was, it was geeky. It was no wonder Danielle was such a small, frail girl, unlike his older sister Tina, who he knew frequented gyms and toned her midsection. Sometimes, Brandon could swear that the smallest gust of wind could threaten to blow little Danielle over.

Lately, though, she caught his attention... especially while he was thinking about taking advantage of small, weak girls, and doing disgusting things to them, and probably fucking them. Something about the fact that the first girl to come to mind was his sister absolutely thrilled him.

He rose from the living room couch and approached Danielle, startling her. She wasn't used to being approached by anyone at home, so this was a bit out of the norm. He smirked at her, then gripped her into a headlock, bending her forward. She yelped and dropped her school bag on the ground, then brought her tiny little hands up to his muscular forearm to try to pry it off. This was a test of strength, and Danielle met Brandon's expectations by being truly and absolutely pathetic.

"Hey Dani," he said in a mischievous if not someone playful voice. "What's going on, hm?"

The girl strained to look up at him, but found herself unable to do so. "N... nothing. Why are you-?"

"Cause I'm your big brother. That means I'm bigger, stronger, and ultimately can do whaaaaatever I'd like to you, doesn't it?" he asked, grinning.

Danielle pressed her lips together, uncertain of how to answer. So, Brandon continued. He...
15.title: Brandon (older brother)

info.brief_description: A girl is turned into a slave for her family's depraved needs. [Quality additions earn GP]
info.description:
Danielle is a fifteen year old girl of smaller stature than most of her peers. She's always been a good girl, tending to her own chores without expectation or demand, and keeping up with her studies. This dutiful daughter never really caught the attention of her family until she entered high school. She had been cute and everything, but now, people were noticing that she had a shy, submissive allure about her. Danielle had no idea that her family was full of perverts with dark, disgusting desires, nor did she realize the way their gazes on her changed over time.

This is a FILTH interactive story with content that some readers may find troubling or disturbing. The original author requests that those disturbed by any of the following subject matter stop reading immediately:

The original author requests that the story focus on or include the following fetish material:

The original author requests that the story not include the following fetish material:

Gore/Excessive Bleeding
Mutilation/Amputation/Crushing
Protagonist's Filth (ie Danielle should be on the receiving end of her family's filth, and the story should not focus on any of her biological functions as far as filth goes.)

If you are contributing to this interactive piece:
You must write at least four sentences of content. One-word or one-sentence entries will be deleted unless you include a chapter following a short choice with actual content. This is a collaborative piece, not a place to request authors to write out your desires for you.
You must write in the third person. In other words, no "I's" or "you's" in narration outside of dialogue.
You must be relatively literate. Entries that don't showcase a writing level beyond a typical gradeschool level will be deleted.
If you have questions, message the original author.


CONTRIBUTION INCENTIVE

Quality additions will earn authors GP! "Quality" pertains to following the rules and guidelines above. If they do so, they are then qualified to receive the GP incentive. In addition to following the rules above, the reward tiers are as follows:

Tier 3: 500 GP
Entry includes descriptive occurrence of scat, watersports, farting, or anything of a non-consensual sexual nature.
Entry is 500 words or more.
Entry involves cruel or dirty talk/narration and/or use of onomatopoeias.
Entry must not attempt to focus on other fetishes or kinks more than the original author's preferred focuses. (See list in rules.)

Tier 2: 250 GP
Entry includes descriptive occurrence of scat, watersports, farting, or anything of a non-consensual sexual nature.
Entry is 250-499 words. (More qualifies the entry for the Tier 3 reward)
Entry involves cruel or dirty talk/narration and/or use of onomatopoeias.
Entry must not attempt to focus on other fetishes or kinks more than the original author's preferred focuses. (See list in rules.)

Tier 1: 100 GP
Entry moves the story along and introduces new chapter choices that will eventually lead to fetish material.
Entry is at least 250 words.
Entry involves cruel or dirty talk/narration.
Entry must not attempt to focus on other fetishes or kinks more than the original author's preferred focuses. (See list in rules.)
